actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide medical care to a deceased veteran's parent(s) who receive dependency and indemnity compensation.

summary.text: Provides that medical care be furnished to a dependent parent who receives dependency and indemnity compensation for the service-connected death of a child who was a member or veteran of the Armed Forces.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to provide medical care to a deceased veteran's parent(s) who receive dependency and indemnity compensation.
